subject: United States Open Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Kenny Cooper and Heath Pearce each scored in the first half to lead the Red Bulls past the host Charleston Battery, 3-0, in the third round of the U.S. Open Cup.
snippet: Kenny Cooper and Heath Pearce each scored in the first half to lead the Red Bulls past the host Charleston Battery, 3-0, in the third round of the U.S. Open Cup.
